text: Sili ice cream is a Filipino ice cream flavor prepared using labuyo chili, coconut milk, pur√©ed strawberries and sugar. It was invented by the 1st Colonial Grill restaurant in Albay in 2004 and has since become a highly popular flavor. It is associated with and inspired by the regional cuisine of Bicol, which characteristically serves spicy dishes in coconut milk Category:Desserts
title: Sili ice cream
